sent.orig: The properties of TEA and possible accidents and preventive measures introduced in PE plant.
sent.trans: 分绍了聚乙烯生产装置中TEA的特点、可能发生的事故及预防措施。

sent.orig: The laser pyrolysis of methane has been studied by means of pulsed TEA CO2 laser.
sent.trans: 采用TEA-CO2激光器为光源，对甲烷激光裂解反应进行研究。

sent.orig: In this case tea consists of a drink and cake or biscuits in the afternoon.
sent.trans: 在这种情况下，tea则指下午的茶点，包括饮料和糕点、饼乾之类。

sent.orig: Package content: tea, tea, tea, coffee, Chinese tea, health tea, herbal tea and other granular materials.
sent.trans: 包装内容：绿茶、红茶、花茶、咖啡、中国茶、健康茶、中药茶等各种颗粒状材料。

sent.orig: We serve Wu Long tea, black tea, green tea, jasmine tea and chrysanthemum tea.
sent.trans: 餐厅有乌龙茶、红茶、绿茶、茉莉花茶和菊花茶。
